reviews.review_msg: she assigned reading responses and group discussions due biweekly (rotating). same assignments, tailored to new readings. It took months to get any grades back. things submitted in January were graded in March. If you made a mistake on your first paper, you wouldn't know and would make that mistake on each paper. you never knew how you were doing.

Took 3 months to get everything back. TA graded like it was a 400 level class and was very rude when asking about feedback. Prof also was useless as she had no idea what was happening. Both were VERY picky about APA style. GPA booster class into the hardest writing class I've taken. AVOID AYSUH AND TARA
Absolutely terrible. GPA booster class became a GPA reducer for me and everyone that took this class with this awful professor.

I would avoid taking EDUC 100 with this professor, as I was midway through the course before I got feedback on many of my items. This meant I could not improve my marks on my discussions or reflective assignments. Very nitpicky on format without considering the substance of what is written. Very terse when emailed about my concerns. Avoid.

I wish there was tags to describe how bad this class was. First off, it took the TA and prof took 3 MONTHS to get a single assignment back! It was only a 500 word reflective essay btw. There are still multiple assignments from Jan that havent been marked. Second, they were so picky about marking. If you're still reading this: AVOID THIS PROF!

Somehow turned one of the easiest class to one of the hardest writing class I've ever taken. Won't not recommend this prof to anyone. TA took 3 months to hand everything back. Absolutely unacceptable.

This prof somehow made an easy class that I took as a GPA booster, hard, she is way too caught up in APA formatting to actually assess the quality of the work, the TA is also an extremely hard marker and they take marks away for petty things. They started giving assignment feedback back once the semester was almost over, just horrible.

W. T. F. how is it possible to turn the easiest course in sfu into the most IMPOSSIBLE thing on earth. the marks are unfair and absurdly hard. the prof gives feedback on an assignment that was handed in 3 MONTHS AGO like bro how am i supposed to learn from my mistakes when the course is already over. smh if u have this prof just drop it.

Managed to make EDUC100W hard for absolutely no reason. Literally every other class had a better average than us and she marked assignments towards the end so we can't even work on whatever we did wrong over the semester. She and her TA were incompetent.

She did not mark any assignments. Just got back our first assignment a couple days ago and she marks real strict. There is no exact organization in her class structure and assignments, kind of hard to know what she wants in order to do well. Without feedback, we do not know where we are at. Took as an gpa booster, but Tara is smt else.

I did not learn anything in this course. She didnt hand back any assignments which meant we didnt know our grade at all. there was no way for us to reflect on feedback and improve for future assignments and it felt like i was just going through the course blindly. only nice thing about the class was she gave us a lot of time to work on assignments
